APIs¶

class pam.scene.Scene(width, height)¶
add_actors(actors, groupname='unnamed')¶

Adding actors to the scene

Parameters

  • actors (Actor) – Single actor or iterable of actors to be added

  • groupname (str, optional) – groupname for the actors to be added. Default to “unnamed”

control()¶

Entry point for where all controls should be done

The available basic controls are:
q

Quit

SPACE

Pause

LEFT

Running backward

RIGHT

Running forward

The function can be extended to provide more controls. Check pygame.event for more info
